title: DoctorsBeyond | Online Doctors
description: SEE OUR HIGHLY TRAINED EMERGENCY MEDICINE, URGENT CARE, PRIMARY CARE & MENTAL HEALTH DOCTORS ONLINE. Tell the doctor your symptoms and how you are feeling. Get diagnosed and have your prescription sent to your local pharmacy in just few clicks. You Pay by Insurance or Self-Pay. Major insurances accepted including medicaid. We are a secure mobile platform where patients and US board certified doctors meet with the purpose of obtaining and providing medical services and prescription. We offer Urgent Care, Primary Care and Mental Health by video, audio or chat. Your prescriptions are sent to the pharmacy closest to you all in a few clicks. Our doctors are board certified in Emergency Medicine, Urgent Care, General Practice, Primary Care, and much more. We treat over 98% of conditions online that does not require a procedures. Urgent Care Clinic We simplified our urgent care to make it easier to navigate. Head Headache, Migraine, Tension Headache, Sinus infections, Ear infections and more Eye Pink eye, Glaucoma, Other eye infections, Eye pain and more Mouth Sore throat, Strep, Mono, toothache and more Breathing & Chest The Flu, Coughing, Sneezing, Asthma, COPD (Smokers lungs), Bronchitis, Walking pneumonia, COVID 19 if stable and more Stomach/Abdomen Minor Abdominal Pain, Nausea, Vomiting, Diarrhea, Stomach virus, Food poisoning, Constipation, and more Skin Rash, Skin infections (cellulitis), Insect bite, Allergic reaction, Itching, and more Bones, Joints & Muscles Muscle strains, Back pains, Joint pains such as Osteoarthritis, Ankle sprains and more Bladder & Genital Kidney Infections, Urinary tract infection (UTI), Urinary incontinence, Erectile Dysfunction (ED), STDs, Vaginal or Penile Discharges, Pelvic pain, Abnormal vaginal bleeding, Painful Menses and more Medication Refill We do 30 day refill on most medications Primary Care Clinic - High blood pressure also called Hypertension - Diabetes - COPD which consist of chronic bronchitis and emphysema - Asthma - High Cholesterol - Seizure - Osteoporosis - Arthritis - Dementia - Medication Refills - And More Mental Health Clinic - Depression - Anxiety - Panic - Bipolar - Grief and Loss - Post Partum Depression - Medication Refills - And More Who are the Doctors? All our doctors, nurse practitioners or physician assistants are US board certified in a range of fields from Emergency Medicine, Urgent Care, Primary Care to Mental Health and much more. They currently practice in your local Emergency Rooms, Urgent Care Primary Care Clinics and Mental Health facilities. How does it work? You select your pharmacy, answer a few questions about your appointment, pick a doctor connect by video, audio or chat and then pick your prescription based on your diagnosis. Your Visit summary is available to you in minutes and you may print it if necessary.
descriptionHTML:
SEE OUR HIGHLY TRAINED EMERGENCY MEDICINE, URGENT CARE, PRIMARY CARE & MENTAL HEALTH DOCTORS ONLINE.

Tell the doctor your symptoms and how you are feeling. Get diagnosed and have your prescription sent to your local pharmacy in just few clicks. You Pay by Insurance or Self-Pay. Major insurances accepted including medicaid.

We are a secure mobile platform where patients and US board certified doctors meet with the purpose of obtaining and providing medical services and prescription. We offer Urgent Care, Primary Care and Mental Health by video, audio or chat. Your prescriptions are sent to the pharmacy closest to you all in a few clicks. Our doctors are board certified in Emergency Medicine, Urgent Care, General Practice, Primary Care, and much more. We treat over 98% of conditions online that does not require a procedures.

Urgent Care Clinic
We simplified our urgent care to make it easier to navigate.

Head
Headache, Migraine, Tension Headache, Sinus infections, Ear infections and more
Eye
Pink eye, Glaucoma, Other eye infections, Eye pain and more
Mouth
Sore throat, Strep, Mono, toothache and more
Breathing & Chest
The Flu, Coughing, Sneezing, Asthma, COPD (Smokers lungs), Bronchitis, Walking pneumonia, COVID 19 if stable and more
Stomach/Abdomen
Minor Abdominal Pain, Nausea, Vomiting, Diarrhea, Stomach virus, Food poisoning, Constipation, and more
Skin
Rash, Skin infections (cellulitis), Insect bite, Allergic reaction, Itching, and more
Bones, Joints & Muscles
Muscle strains, Back pains, Joint pains such as Osteoarthritis, Ankle sprains and more
Bladder & Genital
Kidney Infections, Urinary tract infection (UTI), Urinary incontinence, Erectile Dysfunction (ED), STDs, Vaginal or Penile Discharges, Pelvic pain, Abnormal vaginal bleeding, Painful Menses and more
Medication Refill
We do 30 day refill on most medications

Primary Care Clinic
- High blood pressure also called Hypertension
- Diabetes
- COPD which consist of chronic bronchitis and emphysema
- Asthma
- High Cholesterol
- Seizure
- Osteoporosis
- Arthritis
- Dementia
- Medication Refills
- And More

Mental Health Clinic
- Depression
- Anxiety
- Panic
- Bipolar
- Grief and Loss
- Post Partum Depression
- Medication Refills
- And More

Who are the Doctors?
All our doctors, nurse practitioners or physician assistants are US board certified in a range of fields from Emergency Medicine, Urgent Care, Primary Care to Mental Health and much more. They currently practice in your local Emergency Rooms, Urgent Care Primary Care Clinics and Mental Health facilities.

How does it work?
You select your pharmacy, answer a few questions about your appointment, pick a doctor connect by video, audio or chat and then pick your prescription based on your diagnosis. Your Visit summary is available to you in minutes and you may print it if necessary.
